header: What is the point of E-Sportify?
body: The main goal of E-Sportify is to help create new and maintain connections between players in the world of Dota esports.

header: How can I discover new players?
body: Proceed into the 'search' page and search for new players with parameters to your liking or search for their game tag on the search bar at the top.
Once you have found the player you want you can make a review by changing the page from 'main' to 'review' on the top right of the page.

header: How do I send a message to a player?
body: Proceed to the 'Inbox' page, create a new chat and invite a player by their game tag on the 'members' section.

header: How do I invite a player to my team?
body: Once you have found the player you want you can send an invite on their profile page.
